name: TrueMotion VP6 Video File
summary: Learn about .VP6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open and view .VP6 files with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Media Player Classic with K-Lite Mega Codec Pack
Microsoft Windows Media Player with Storm Codec

content: The video format used by Adobe Flash Player 8 and 9 is based on the On2 TrueMotion VP6 codec.

description: VP6 is a lossy compression video format that was introduced by On2 technologies in May 2003. It is a part of series of video codecs developed by TrueMotion including V3, V4 and V5. The format was used shortly in broadcasting field such as with BBC reports and QuickLink software. VP6 was succeeded by VP7 Codec in January 2005 with better compression compatibility.

Encoded video format developed by On2 Technologies; used primarily for Internet video and Flash video files; supports multi-pass encoding, constant or variable data rates, and advanced error recovery; can be used to encode high resolution video, including 1920x1080 HD video streams.
